channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large potholes, 23rd March
item.description:
Large potholes on the left hand side of the road, forces people onto the other side of the road to avoid, into oncoming cars

item.title: Two small but deep potholes, where the road surface Jones, 23rd March
item.description:
This was resurfaced in 2022 so it’s disappointing to see these holes. Can somebody please fill them in probably about seven or 8 cm deep

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham

item.title: Hole in road, 23rd March
item.description:
Can only be described as a dangerous hole in the road. Borderline lethal for scooters or cyclists. Car tyre damaging potential. Looks like a failed repair!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Cromwell Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights do not work for bikes, 23rd March
item.description:
Traffic lights do not register until a motor vehicle arrives. Lights should work for all road users

item.title: Traffic lights do not detect cyclists, 23rd March
item.description:
Traffic lights do not register until a motor vehicle arrives. Lights should work for all road users.

item.title: Two Large and Deep Potholes, 23rd March
item.description:
These 2 potholes are dangerous not only in size and depth but the location of them. The road is narrow and vision can be difficult, these pot holes make for a potential accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Cowley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiply Potholes and Road broken up, 23rd March
item.description:
A large area in the MIDDLE of the road needs urgent attention. There are many potholes and the road is broken up. It is a hazard becasue you have to stop your car to drive over the area. There is a cycle event on Sunday 26th March and this area is lethal for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 50cm/20” width, 23rd March
item.description:
This pot hole is getting bigger and bigger, it has been here for a month and because of its size a danger to cars and cyclists. There is a cycle event coming through the village on Sunday 26th March and I would advise this is a lethal hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Exceptionally dangerous stretch - numerous potholes, 23rd March
item.description:
Too dangerous to stop to take photos. Numerous photos on both sides of the road. Big/deep holes that could cause a lot of damage & cause serious accident. Would be hard to avoid in dark/when raining. This whole stretch of road right up to the Air Ballon needs to be check and resurfaced. Higher volume of traffic on this road due to the A435 into Cheltenham being closed for 7 months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Leckhampton Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole Near East End Junction, 23rd March
item.description:
Bad pothole with metalwork in the middle. Needs fixing. High flow of traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Detmore Close, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep and dangerous, 23rd March
item.description:
This is the worst of a number of potholes along this busy road. Someone will be injured along here unless you resolve the issues asap. Note this as a warning as such. You have responsibility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Verney Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 22nd March
item.description:
Council states they have repaired the potholes in the entrance to Folland Avenue. Two signs were put up and nothing else done/ it would be difficult to tell if there has been which it looks like it has. The road is not safe for any type of bike as the road is not even level. You cannot avoid the damaged road surface especially when there are cars parked all down the road after the traffic lights. Reporting for a third time in the hopes repairs will actually be made.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cranham Lodge Folland Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Potholes are making it difficult to reverse onto my drive

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Whittington Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Overgrown access, 21st March
item.description:
The stile to get onto the footbridge is over grown with bramble. Bramble has also grown onto the bridge path too. ///boot.fancied.sensitive

item.title: RoW inaccessible, 21st March
item.description:
The RoW after leaving the private garden with RoW in it hasn’t been kept and is inaccessible. I was forced to enter the private field that had a resident horse in it. The bridge on the other side has been replaced, but the access to get to the bridge hasn’t been addressed. ///rating.puns.name

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Rudgeley House Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown access, 21st March
item.description:
Unable to use stile for RoW on the Gloucestershire Way due to overgrown hedging. /Iloval.poems.pitch
